Job_title: Junior Graduate Accountant & Customer Success Specialist
Descriptions: The Role:, The Role:, As a graduate accounts and customer Success Specialist, your role will be with a focus on client interaction, particularly through phone calls so good english is a must with a bubbly personality. Your responsibilities will include:, General accounting for a small business with few transactions ( a couple of hours a day) and reporting:Managing and accurately maintaining financial records, preparing financial reports, and ensuring compliance with legal standards.Active Client Communication:Your primary responsibility will be maintaining regular contact with clients through phone calls. This involves not just responding to inquiries but also proactively reaching out to discuss financial matters, provide updates, and build strong, trusting relationships.Problem Solving and Advisory:Offering strategic financial advice during client calls, addressing their concerns, and helping them navigate through various financial scenarios.Customer Success and Support:Using your communication skills, particularly over the phone, to ensure client satisfaction, understand their feedback, and offer tailored solutions.Data Entry and Management:Handling data entry tasks with precision and accuracy, ensuring the integrity of financial data.Collaborative Support for Sales and Marketing Teams:Providing key financial insights to the sales team, often involving phone discussions to align sales strategies with financial data. You may also be involved in client calls alongside sales team members to offer financial perspectives.Continuous Learning and Adaptation:Staying updated with financial trends and regulations, especially in the digital marketing sector, to provide the most current advice during client interactions., General accounting for a small business with few transactions ( a couple of hours a day) and reporting:Managing and accurately maintaining financial records, preparing financial reports, and ensuring compliance with legal standards., General accounting for a small business with few transactions ( a couple of hours a day) and reporting:, Active Client Communication:Your primary responsibility will be maintaining regular contact with clients through phone calls. You may also be involved in client calls alongside sales team members to offer financial perspectives., Collaborative Support for Sales and Marketing Teams:, Continuous Learning and Adaptation:Staying updated with financial trends and regulations, especially in the digital marketing sector, to provide the most current advice during client interactions., Continuous Learning and Adaptation:, , Requirements:, Requirements:, A degree in Accountancy or a related field.Exceptional communication skills, with a strong emphasis on phone-based client interaction.Experience in accountancy, preferably in a client-facing role.Proficiency in data entry and financial analysis.Ability to work collaboratively with different teams., A degree in Accountancy or a related field., Exceptional communication skills, with a strong emphasis on phone-based client interaction., Experience in accountancy, preferably in a client-facing role., Proficiency in data entry and financial analysis., Ability to work collaboratively with different teams.,

Bloom & Growwas established in 2004 in Hong Kong to supply retailers with a handpicked collection of award-winning baby products., Bloom & Grow, Grown organically and through acquisition to become a leading distributor, marketplace operator and online retailer of premium baby, parenting & family products to retailers and consumers across China, Southeast Asia, Australia and New Zealand., We have launched and nurtured dozens of international brands, making the likes of Skip Hop™, Ergobaby™, Oxo™, Trunki™, Beaba™ and Pearhead™ household names in our region., For retailers, we recently launched the region's first B2B marketplace for our sector: 'Bloom-Connect', serving retailers across Southeast Asia, Australia and New Zealand; and, 'BG-Go', a B2B WeChat Store for Chinese retailers., For consumers, we operate multiple flagship brand stores on the region's leading marketplaces including Tmall, JD and Lazada, along with many standalone consumer sites across our markets., Our 100+ team of branding, marketing, sales, logistics and digital specialists - spanning seven regional offices, warehouses, local languages, time zones and cultures - provide turnkey market access for brand owners, complete category fulfillment for retailers, and fresh exciting product collections for our consumers., For our staff, we work closely together based on six Core Values:Energy, Loyalty, Inspiration, Innovation, Accountability and Integrity.We only hire people who share these values and in return, we offer a fun and exciting start-up style environment, where every individual is valued and rewarded for their flexibility, loyalty, accountability, cross-team and cross-cultural effort, innovation and success., Energy, Loyalty, Inspiration, Innovation, Accountability and Integrity., , , Find out more about us here: www.bloomandgrowgroup.com, We invite top talents to join us.Please send your CV stating your academic qualification, career history, and availability with your current and expected salary to HR department by clicking "Apply Now", We look forward to hearing from you soon!, ***, Bloom & Grow is an equal opportunity employer, requires professional and personal references prior to confirming employment terms, and welcomes applicants from any background., ***, Personal data collected are for recruitment purposes only. All applications will be destroyed after 6 months.,

Responsibilities:1、Help the project implementation team to complete project research,  development, implementation, system deployment, and acceptance.2、Analyze and design customer business requirements, control the scope of  requirements, and be responsible for core document preparation.3、Control the implementation process, managing project scope, progress,  quality, risks, costs, and change management.4、Coordinate and mobilize various resources during project implementation,  and provide guidance to the team of consultants and development consultants to complete assigned tasks.5、Control and manage on-site personnel during project operation and  communicate with high-level clients on-site.Qualifications:1、Bachelor's degree in computer science, software, business management,  water management, or related fields, with at least 5 years of experience in project management, requirements analysis, or technical development.2、Experience in the forestry/agriculture/water management industry, large-scale IoT projects, smart manufacturing projects, or enterprise digital transformation project implementation is preferred.3、Familiarity with project management or possession of a PMP certificate is  a plus. Proficiency in project management throughout the entire process, understanding the characteristics of waterfall and agile mode management, and the ability to independently develop project management plans.4、Strong communication, coordination, logical thinking, data analysis, and  document preparation skills, with the ability to handle pressure and execute effectively.5、Ability to lead a team, prioritize teamwork, and allocate tasks to team  members effectively.6、Excellent English language skills, both written and spoken.7、Willingness to travel domestically and internationally.,

PT Karya Bahari Abadi hadir dengan solusi mumpuni bagi dunia transportasi maritim Indonesia. Didirikan di Jakarta pada 2006, PT Karya Bahari Abadi ditunjuk oleh Yamaha Motor Co., Ltd. Jepang sebagai distributor resmi Indonesia untuk produk maritim Yamaha yang terdiri dari mesin tempel (Yamaha Outboards), kendaraan air personal Yamaha WaveRunner, suku cadang asli Yamaha, dan pelumas Yamalube., Dengan lebih dari tujuh belas ribu pulau yang terpisah oleh lautan di khatulistiwa, wilayah Indonesia didominasi oleh perairan. Karena itu, untuk mengoptimalkan mobilitas serta pendayagunaan potensi laut, Indonesia membutuhkan dukungan medium transportasi air yang handal serta sarana pendukung yang lengkap., Seiring pesatnya permintaan dan meluasnya daerah pemasaran produk maritim Yamaha di Indonesia, PT Karya Bahari Abadi terus berupaya mengembangkan diri. Mulai dari wilayah pesisir Indonesia barat hingga ke Indonesia Timur, jaringan penjualan serta layanan servis resmi berdiri lebih dekat dengan pengguna produk maritim Yamaha. Ditambah dengan reputasi yang baik atas sistem purnajual yang tertata rapi, PT Karya Bahari Abadi sanggup mempertahankan kepercayaan dan kepuasan pengguna setia Yamaha., Adapun saat ini PT Karya Bahari mengembangkan bisnisnya ke wilayah-wilayah potensial di Indonesia, dalam hal ini akan dibukanya cabang baru di Ternate Maluku Utara. Mengingat potensial yang cukup besar di wilayah tersebut, sehingga kami membutuhkan tenaga kerja sebagai berikut :, PROFIL PEKERJAAN, Posisi : Staff Gudang, Divisi : Warehouse, Lokasi : Ternate - Maluku Utara, Melapor Kepada : Kepala Cabang, DESKRIPSI PEKERJAAN, 1. PT Karya Bahari Abadihadir dengan solusi mumpuni bagi dunia transportasi maritim Indonesia. Didirikan di Jakarta pada 2006, PT Karya Bahari Abadi ditunjuk oleh Yamaha Motor Co., Ltd. Jepang sebagai distributor resmi Indonesia untuk produk maritim Yamaha yang terdiri dari mesin tempel (Yamaha Outboards), kendaraan air personal Yamaha WaveRunner, suku cadang asli Yamaha, dan pelumas Yamalube., PT Karya Bahari Abadi, Dengan lebih dari tujuh belas ribu pulau yang terpisah oleh lautan di khatulistiwa, wilayah Indonesia didominasi oleh perairan. Karena itu, untuk mengoptimalkan mobilitas serta pendayagunaan potensi laut, Indonesia membutuhkan dukungan medium transportasi air yang handal serta sarana pendukung yang lengkap., Seiring pesatnya permintaan dan meluasnya daerah pemasaran produk maritim Yamaha di Indonesia, PT Karya Bahari Abadi terus berupaya mengembangkan diri. Mulai dari wilayah pesisir Indonesia barat hingga ke Indonesia Timur, jaringan penjualan serta layanan servis resmi berdiri lebih dekat dengan pengguna produk maritim Yamaha. Ditambah dengan reputasi yang baik atas sistem purnajual yang tertata rapi, PT Karya Bahari Abadi sanggup mempertahankan kepercayaan dan kepuasan pengguna setia Yamaha., Adapun saat ini PT Karya Bahari sedang membutuhkan personel sebagai berikut :, PROFIL PEKERJAAN, PROFIL PEKERJAAN, Posisi :Admin, Admin, Lokasi : Ternate - Maluku Utara, Melapor Kepada : Kepala Cabang, , DESKRIPSI PEKERJAAN, DESKRIPSI PEKERJAAN, 1.
